org.xmlcml.cml.legacy.molecule
Class MDLConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.cml.legacy.molecule.MDLConverter

public class MDLConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles conversion of ChemicalMarkupLanguage documents to and from MDL Information Systems MolFile format. This class has support for both the V2000 and V3000 MolFile formats. When reading files the version is detected automatically and can later be found using getVersion. When writing files, use setVersion to dictate what verison of MolFile is written out.

The converter currently has full support for the V2000 & V3000 connection tables, as well as many properties of atoms including charge, isotopic mass, and spin multiplicity.

Stereochemistry support is currently limited.

Author:
Peter Murry-Rust, Ramin Ghorashi (2005)

MDLConverter

Method Detail

setVersion

public void setVersion(java.lang.String version)
Sets the version of MolFile that MDLConverter will write out. If version isnt set before writing a MolFile the default value of V2000 is used.

Parameters:
version - either MDLConverter.V2000 or MDLConverter.V3000

getVersion

public java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns the version of MolFile that MDLConverter will write out, if called after reading in a MolFile it will return the version of that MolFile

Returns:
version

the Document object representing the parsed files.

readMOL

public CMLMolecule readMOL(java.io.Reader reader)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           CMLException
Reads an input stream containing either a single MDL molecule or positioned at the start of one. The version of MolFile is automatically detected and can be found using getVersion()

Parameters:
reader - the Reader pointing to the MolFile
Returns:
the parsed CMLMolecule
Throws:
java.io.IOException
CMLException

writeMOL

public void writeMOL(java.io.Writer writer)
              throws CMLException,
                     java.io.IOException
Outputs the last read molecule as an MDL MolFile. The version of MolFile written can be set using setVersion(), else the default verison, V2000, is written.

Parameters:
writer - the Writer to output the MolFile to
Throws:
CMLException
java.io.IOException

writeMOL

public void writeMOL(java.io.Writer writer,
                     CMLMolecule mol)
              throws CMLException,
                     java.io.IOException
Outputs a given CMLMolecule as an MDL MolFile, the version of MolFile written can be set using setVersion(), else the default verison, V2000, is written.

Parameters:
writer - the Writer to output the MolFile to
mol - the CMLMolecule to parse and output
Throws:
CMLException
java.io.IOException

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Provides a command line and graphical user interface to MDLConverter.

Usage:
org.xmlcml.legacy.molecule.MOLConverter [options]
-IN inputFile (MOL or CML)
-OUT outputFile (CML or MOL)
-V3000 force output of a V3000 MOL (regardless of outputFile extension)
determines file types from suffix (mol or cml)

If no arguments are supplied then the GUI is brought up.

Parameters:
args -
